thread.title: Trump's voter fraud claims rooted in Alabama man's work
thread.title_full: Trump's voter fraud claims rooted in Alabama man's work

author: John Sharp | jsharp@al.com
title: Trump's voter fraud claims rooted in Alabama man's work
text: Gregg Phillips' claims of widespread voter fraud was cited in a Jan. 27 tweet by President Donald Trump. Since then, Phillips says his family has been the target of threats on social media. But Phillips said he "wouldn't take back" Trump's attention and hopes it leads to changes in electoral integrity.
